title.narrative: Support to the AWG EU Water Initiative - IRC INT Water & Sanitation Centre

description.narrative: This activity (Support to the AWG EU Water Initiative - IRC INT Water & Sanitation Centre) is a component of Support to the EU Water Initiative's Africa Working Group reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £70,000. This component benefits Africa, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Water sector policy and administrative management, Basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation, Public sector policy and administrative management, Privatisation, Rural development. The start date is 30-01-2008 and the end date is 30-06-2009.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
